title: Lightweight and Scalable DAG based distributed ledger for verifying IoT data integrity
citation: S. R. Cherupally, S. Boga, P. Podili and K. Kataoka, "Lightweight and Scalable DAG based distributed ledger for verifying IoT data integrity," 2021 International Conference on Information Networking (ICOIN), 2021, pp. 267-272, doi: 10.1109/ICOIN50884.2021.9334000.
